categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hanik Jormani was a Human male who was a Sith Inquisitor within the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at Dorn Base on the planet Hoth, where he shared his knowledge with fellow Sith.
Hanik Jormani appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Sith Inquisitor class on Hoth.
